caller_intent: The caller seeks assistance with closing bank accounts, resolving declined transactions, and addressing a pending payment. They also want to set up online banking and block Zel (likely Zelle) transfers.
resolution_steps: Agent Anna connects the caller with Ava, a banker, via speakerphone.
They plan to close the savings account and deposit $15 into a checking account to test online banking functionality.
Ava will attempt to delete the online banking profile and block Zel transfers.
Caller is advised to contact Edward's bank to cancel a pending transaction.
Agent agrees to follow up via text with updates.
knowledge_required: Reasons for transaction declines (e.g., foreign ATM use)
Handling pending payments and transaction cancellations
summary: The caller is troubleshooting bank account issues, including declined transactions and a pending payment. The agent collaborates with a banker to close accounts, set up online banking, and address transaction problems. Resolution steps include testing account functionality and follow-up communication.
